name: 探灵笔记—小明·灵调局学员装（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
Xiaoming Lingzhao Student Uniform Costume Package (with 29999 Lingjian) DLC, including Xiaoming Lingzhao Student Uniform Permanent Unlock, with a gift of 29999 Lingjian DLC.



"When I was a teenager, I saw all the flowers in Chang'an every day."

The uniform issued by male students when they first entered the "Spiritual Investigation Authority". Even if we seal the place of complaint deeply, we can let the spirit explore fresh, handsome and elegant.

Shoes: leather shoes
